preprocessing module¶

preprocessing.load(file)¶

Loads data as numpy array from a provided files.

Args:

file: the file to load the data from.

Returns:

The data.

preprocessing.rescalling(data, scale)¶

rescalls the data.

Args:

scale:

Returns:

The data after scalling.

preprocessing.save(data, file)¶

Writes the date to a provided file.

Args:

data: the data to be saved. file: the file to save the data to.

preprocessing.split_train_test(data, test_ratio)¶

Splits data to train and test.

Args:

data: data to be splitted. test_ratio: ratio of test data.

Returns:

train data, test data as a tuple.
